long_description: Printed on waterproof paper, this map is your guide to exploring the San Gabriel Mountains of the Angeles National Forest. Topographic map shows roads, trails and campgrounds in Cucamonga, San Gabriel and Sheep Mountain wilderness areas. Back of map provides 100 hike recommendations. Contour interval is 80 feet; index contours. Folded size: 7 x 4.5 inches. Wilderness Press; 5th edition, copyright 2005.
short_description: Printed on waterproof paper, this map is your guide to exploring the San Gabriel Mountains of the Angeles National Forest.
